biotools.summary: Alfie is an alignment-free, kingdom level taxonomic classifier for DNA barcode data. Alfie classifies sequences using a neural network which takes k-mer frequencies (default k = 4) as inputs and makes kingdom level classification predictions.

bioschemas.name: Alfie
bioschemas.summary: Alfie is an alignment-free, kingdom level taxonomic classifier for DNA barcode data. Alfie classifies sequences using a neural network which takes k-mer frequencies (default k = 4) as inputs and makes kingdom level classification predictions.
